backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, client records, progress tracking, permissions, and related comparison utilities with access-control checks for querying and saving data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence assessments.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files including pages, hooks, utilities, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the main React app and including SheetJS for Excel export.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, backend readiness, profile setup flow, routing, and error/loading states with lazy-loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Login screen component that initiates Internet Identity authentication with styled UI elements.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to enter and save their name using a mutation hook with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/clients/ActionHi: Tooltip component showing contextual action hints with optional alert icon.
frontend/src/components/clients/Activate: Dialog allowing selection of a start date and follow‑up day to activate a client plan with validation.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientPr: Card showing primary client actions such as activate, pause, resume, renew, expire, and convert to full onboarding.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsS: Dropdown button for filtering clients by status and showing counts for each filter option.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientSt: Displays a badge representing the client's current status including active, paused, expired, expiring, or onboarding states.
frontend/src/components/clients/ConvertT: Button to convert a client to full onboarding with loading and disabled‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/clients/ExportCl: Dialog for exporting client data to Excel, supporting full export or selecting specific fields.
frontend/src/components/clients/FollowUp: Dialog to record follow‑up status and notes, supporting automatic and manual modes with validation.
Displays a client's follow‑up status, provides a button to mark follow‑ups as done, and lists follow‑up history in a table.
frontend/src/components/clients/PauseCli: Modal dialog allowing users to pause a client's plan by entering duration and reason with validation.
frontend/src/components/clients/RenewSub: Dialog for renewing a client's subscription by selecting plan months, extra days, and start date with validation.
frontend/src/components/clients/Subscrip: Shows a table of client subscriptions, highlighting the current one and displaying duration and date details.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Wrapper dialog showing active clients using ClientsMetricDialog with predefined labels.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Client: Generic dialog displaying client lists with export support, navigation, and optional plan end date or onboarding info.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Expiri: Wrapper dialog showing clients whose plans expire soon using ClientsMetricDialog with preset text.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Onboar: Dialog listing onboarding clients with view, export, and convert-to-full-onboarding actions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Paused: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to show paused clients with plan end dates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Renewa: Dialog displaying clients with plans expiring this month and supports viewing and exporting data.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalC: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to show all active clients without plan end dates.
frontend/src/components/debug/InitialLoa: Debug panel showing real‑time initial load timing events and totals.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/RouteLoad: Centered spinner shown while routes are loading.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Provides onboarding status explanations and an alert about activation requirements.
Multi‑step onboarding wizard with step indicators, scrollable content, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/progress/Progres: Renders weight and body measurement line charts using sorted progress data, showing empty state when no entries exist.
Provides a form to submit new progress measurements, validates inputs, and triggers a backend mutation.
Displays progress entries in a sortable table with trend indicators comparing each entry to the previous one.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Wraps useActor to expose an actorReady flag after a short delay to avoid race conditions during identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Polls the backend's readiness endpoint with exponential backoff and resets when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and exposing login state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, including app init data, user profiles, and client summaries, with identity‑scoped caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Implements a simple hash‑based router with helpers for navigating and extracting a client code from the route.
frontend/src/hooks/useStableActorConnect: Provides a stabilized backend‑connection state with a small delay to prevent UI flicker once backend readiness is confirmed.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global TailwindCSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ClientProfilePage.tsx: Renders an interactive client profile view with actions, progress, follow‑ups, and dialogs driven by query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsListPage.tsx: Displays a filterable and searchable list of clients with export capabilities and status‑based views.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows high‑level client metrics and opens detailed dialogs for specific client groups using summary data.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardClientPage.tsx: Implements a multi‑step onboarding form for creating clients with validation and submission logic.
frontend/src/utils/clientCode.ts: Provides helpers to format, normalize, and compare client codes.
frontend/src/utils/clientExportFields.ts: Defines exportable client fields and accessors for building spreadsheet rows.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into short, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/excelExport.ts: Exports client data to an Excel file using SheetJS with dynamic column sizing.
frontend/src/utils/followUp.ts: Calculates follow‑up due status and retrieves latest follow‑up entries for clients.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats timestamps into readable date, datetime, or Excel-safe formats.
frontend/src/utils/initialLoadTimings.ts: Tracks and reports initial load performance when debug mode is enabled.
frontend/src/utils/mobileNumber.ts: Normalizes and validates mobile numbers with basic digit checks.
frontend/src/utils/plan.ts: Computes plan durations, end dates, and formats dates for input fields.
Identifies clients with subscriptions ending this month and counts renewal opportunities.
frontend/src/utils/status.ts: Defines helpers to compute client activation, end dates, status, display status, and aggregates active/paused/expired metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params (including hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, colors, typography, container queries, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, known issues, and existing feature work related to fixing slow backend connection and polling behavior.
